alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 3:22PM CDT until May 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN POLK AND NORTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 322 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Morrisville, or 8 miles south of Bolivar, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stockton Lake, Fair Grove, Walnut Grove, Pleasant Hope, Fair Play, Morrisville, Aldrich, Sacville, Ebenezer, Eudora and Brighton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
